npc.label: Nib Addlespur (Healer)
npc.name: Nib Addlespur (Healer) 1

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Nib rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Nib have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Nib can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Nib can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame
1st level (2 slots): cure wounds

npc.spells: Guidance, Sacred Flame, Cure Wounds

action.name: Quarterstaff
action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Nib rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Nib have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Nib can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Nib can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Nib casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance, light, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): aid, lesser restoration
3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify
4th level (2 slots): death ward, banishment
5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds

npc.spells: Guidance, Sacred Flame, Cure Wounds, Bless, Shield of Faith, Resistance, Aid, Light, Lesser Restoration, Protection from Energy, Revivify, Death Ward, Banishment, Greater Restoration, Spare the Dying, Mass Cure Wounds

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

npc.label: Nib Addlespur (Healer)
npc.name: Nib Addlespur (Healer) 14

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Nib rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Nib have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Nib can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Nib can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: Nib can increase the power of their simpler spells. When Nib casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, Nib can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Nib casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance, light, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): aid, lesser restoration
3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify
4th level (3 slots): death ward, banishment
5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, dispel evil and good
6th level (1 slot): heal
7th level (1 slot): regenerate

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: Nib can increase the power of their simpler spells. When Nib casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, Nib can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Empowered Spells
trait.text: Choose one school of magic. Whenever Nib casts a spell of that school by expending a spell slot, Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell’s damage roll or healing roll, if any.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance, light, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): aid, lesser restoration
3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify
4th level (3 slots): death ward, banishment
5th level (2 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, dispel evil and good
6th level (1 slot): heal, heroes' feast
7th level (1 slot): regenerate
8th level (1 slot): holy aura
9th level (1 slot): mass heal

action.text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

npc.label: Nib Addlespur (Healer)
npc.name: Nib Addlespur (Healer) 18

trait.name: Lucky
trait.text: When Nib rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, she can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Brave
trait.text: Nib have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
trait.text: Nib can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than her.

trait.name: Naturally Stealthy
trait.text: Nib can attempt to hide even when she is obscured only by a creature that is at least one size larger than her.

trait.name: Spell Mastery
trait.text: Nib has such mastery over certain spells that they can cast them at will. Choose a 1st-level spell and a 2nd-level spell that are Nib knows. Nib can cast those spells twice at their lowest level without expending a spell slot.

trait.name: Overchannel
trait.text: Nib can increase the power of their simpler spells. When Nib casts a spell of 5th level or lower that deals damage or heals, Nib can deal maximum damage/healing with that spell once per day.

trait.name: Potent Cantrips
trait.text: Nib can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

trait.name: Spellcasting
trait.text: Nib’s spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 18, +10 to hit with spell attacks). Nib has following cleric spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, resistance, light, spare the dying
1st level (4 slots): cure wounds, bless, shield of faith
2nd level (3 slots): aid, lesser restoration
3rd level (3 slots): protection from energy, revivify
4th level (3 slots): death ward, banishment
5th level (3 slots): greater restoration, mass cure wounds, dispel evil and good
6th level (1 slot): heal, heroes' feast
7th level (1 slot): regenerate, resurrection
8th level (1 slot): holy aura
9th level (1 slot): mass heal
